title: Is psychological autopsy legal? - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: In general, in the USA [and UK] everything is legal unless there is a law making it illegal. So unless you can think of a reason why it would harm people for it to be legal, it probably will be legal. There is no reason it should be illegal. It will, however, not be done except in cases of suicide or perhaps where the deceased killed someone and the police are attempting to figure out why the deceased acted as they did.
Certainly, why would it not be? A psychological autopsy is used. generally, to try to figure out the state of mind of people who have completed suicide.
